actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of establishing a Hells Canyon National Recreation Area in the States of Idaho and Oregon.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and suitablity of establishing a Hells Canyon National Recreation Area in the States of Idaho and Oregon. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of establishing a Hells Canyon National Recreation Area in the States of Idaho and Oregon.
